channel.title: Quick Question

item.title: Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @Trigger1 Trigger*
item.description:
@Trigger1 wrote:

Declare

	private void Protectmelee() 
	{
		if (HEALTH_LEVEL >= 21)
		{
			protMelee = false;
		}
		if (HEALTH_LEVEL <= 20 && !protMelee)
		{
			protMelee = true;
			log("Setting Prayers");
			openTab(TAB_PRAYER);
			clickMouse(716, 341, true);
		}
	}
	private boolean protMelee;[/code]
In process add
[code]Protectmelee();

Read full topic
